Tunyina munzi mubotu, Tatuyandi wa mu nyika;   
Pesi atu komanisye, Mbotu langa munzi umbi,   
Mbotu langa munzi umbi.

  **2.**   
Tunyina munzi mubotu, Tulanga uta libonyi;   
Zioni ndi zina lyawo, U lasalala bunene,   
U lasalala bunene.

  **3.**   
Nci lawo ca kuumuna, Nci lawo ca banununwa;   
Kuti ndaba amababa, Ndila kuulukila Ôko   
Ndila kuulukila Ôko.

  **4.**   
Moyo wangu ko umuna, Ulizyi cindi ceelede;   
Nkubotu ndi munyonene, Limwi mwini a ndi lesye,   
Limwi mwini a ndi lesye.

title: 190: ZINA LIBOTU
markdown:
CS 216 AH 100 CH 523 SDAH 474   
 ### 190 ZINA LIBOTU   
PRECIOUS NAME

Doh is Ab

  **1.**   
Tola izyina lya Jesu, Mwana waka pengede;   
Lila kuku komanisya, Tola izyina eli.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Izyina É Libotu ÉÉ lila colwe munyika;   
Izyina É Libotu ÉÉ lila colwe ku julu.

  **2.**   
Izyina libotu lyakwe, Lili intobo yako;   
Kuti wabona kusunkwa, Syoma izyina eli.

  **3.**   
Izyina libotu lyakwe, Lila sekesya moyo;   
Tata naya kutu ita, Tula kwimbila Jesu.

  **4.**   
Tula kumuvuntamina, Tula kumu lemeka;   
Ula kuba Mwami wesu, Twaku sika ku julu.

title: 191: CISININZYO CIBOTU
markdown:
### 191 CISININZYO CIBOTU   
BLESSED ASSURANCE

  **1.**   
Jesu ngu wangu nda syomenzya, Ndakomana mu bulemu bwakwe,   
Nda futusyingwa ndakaulwa, Amanza akwe abulowa.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Makani angu lwimbo lwangu, Kulumbaizya Mufutuli;   
Makani angu lwimbo, lwangu, Kulumbaizya Mufutuli;

  **2.**   
Nkulipa kwangu nda komana, Lino ndila bola kukomana;   
Bala seluka ibangele, Baleta luse aluyando.

  **3.**   
Nkulipa kwangu ndilyokezye, Mu Mufutuli ndila komana;   
Ndila lindila a ku boola, Uzwide luse a luyando.

title: 192: COLWE KU ZYINA
markdown:
### 192 COLWE KU ZYINA   
GLORY TO HIS NAME

  **1.**   
Aciingano mpa kafwa Jesu, Mponda kalila kusanzigwa,   
Mponda kanununwa bulowa, Colwe ku zyina.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Colwe ku zyina …… Colwe ku zyina …….   
Mponda kasanzigwa bulowa, Colwe ku zyina

  **2.**   
Ndaka nununwa a bulowa, Jesu ula kala mu moyo;   
Wandi tambula a ciingano, Colwe ku zyina.

  **3.**   
Itinti libotu livuna, Nda komana mbo ndaka njila,   
Nda jatwa Jesu mu Kubisya, Colwe ku zyina.

  **4.**   
Kobola ku tinti libotu, Kowa ansi kumbele kwakwe;   
Njila mu tinti eli sunu, Colwe ku zyina.

title: 193: NZILA YAKWE ANDIME
markdown:
CS 58   
 ### 193 NZILA YAKWE ANDIME   
HIS WAY WITH THEE   
Doh is G

  **1.**   
Uyanda kuba a Jesu aku komana?   
Amu kazila kasyoonto a nguwe?   
Hena aku gwasye imukuli ulema?   
Leka abe andiwe.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Inguzu zyakwe zikusandule,   
Bulowa bwakwe bulakusanzya,   
Luyando lwakwe lula kuponya,   
Ncibotu kuti abe andiwe.

  **2.**   
Hena uyanda kuti a kwaangulule?   
Mu luumuno lwakwe loonse?   
Aku futule kuti uta bisyi limbi,   
Leka abe andiwe.

  **3.**   
Hena muli nguwe ula lyookezya?   
Ula mukondwa mu cisyomyo cakwe?   
Hena wali sungula kumu belekela?   
Leka abe andiwe.

title: 194: NOTU YANDANA
markdown:
CS 580 SDAH 652   
 ### 194 NOTU YANDANA   
LOVE AT HOME   
Doh is Ab

  **1.**   
Munzi uli mubotu, No tu yandana;   
Kuseka konse konse, Notu yandana,   
Nkokuli kuumuna Kunyina nzala nkuko,   
Cindi cila fwambana, No tu yandana.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Kuliswe, Kuliswe, Cindi cila fwambana,   
No tu yandana.

  **2.**   
Nku komana mu nkanda, No tuyandana,   
Kunyina kusulana, No tu yandana,   
Nzila ila maluba, Nzila yonse nimbotu,   
Ila tu komanisya No tu yandana.

  **3.**   
Kujulu kula seka, No tuyandana,   
Nyika ila luyando, No tu yandana,   
Kalonga kalaseka, Izuba lila bala,   
Mwami ula sekesya, No tu yandana.

  **4.**   
Jesu tuvune kuti, Tu kayandane,   
Atu lisende kuti, Tu kayandane,   
Taci ko cindi penzya, A twa munyika tonse;   
Nda lelekwa mu luse, Tuka yandane.

title: 195: OYO MULILO
markdown:
### 195 OYO MULILO

O FOR THAT FLAME 

  **1.**   
Ndayanda oyo mulilo, Waka mweka kwa bakale;   
Bakalangila ku julu, Baka zunda mu masunko.

  **2.**   
Uli kuli oyo muya, waka sandula Abulahamu,   
Waka umunzya Paulo, Waba anguzu zya Leza.

  **3.**   
Inguzu zya ka Elija, Zyaka mana sena sunu?   
Zyaka musalazya Mosi, A Jobe wabikilila.

  **4.**   
Mwami koyeya zya kale, Kotilila luse lwako;   
Notu leta myoyo yesu, Utile muy’ usalala.

title: 196: KULI NGUZU MU BULOWA
markdown:
CS 27 SDAH 294   
 ### 196 KULI NGUZU MU BULOWA   
THERE IS POWER IN THE BLOOD

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Sena u yanda kusowa kubi Bulowa bwakwe bula Ônguzu;   
U la ku yanda ku koma kubi Muli nguzu mu bulowa.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Muli nguzu nguzu zipati, Mu bulowa bwakwe   
Muli nguzu nguzu zipati mu bulowa bwa Jesu.

  **2.**   
Sena u yanda ku angulululwa Bulowa bwakwe bula Ônguzu;   
Bola ku tinti lya Kalivali muli nguzu mu bulowa.

  **3.**   
Sena uyanda kusalazigwa Bulowa bwakwe bula Ônguzu;   
Mabala onse ala gusigwa muli nguzu mu bulowa.

  **4.**   
U yanda ku mu nyonena Jesu Bulowa bwakwe bula Ônguzu;   
U yanda ku lumbaizya lyonse muli nguzu mu bulowa.

title: 197: TA KU KASIYI
markdown:
CS 854 SDAH 208   
 ### 197 TA KU KASIYI   
THEREÕLL BE NO DARK VALLEY

Doh is F

  **1.**   
Ta ku kasiyi Jesu a bo la, Ta kukasiyi Jesu a bola,   
Ta ku kasiyi Jesu a bola, Ku tola bana bakwe.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ku tola bana bakwe, Ku tola bana bakwe;   
Ta ku kasiyi Jesu a bola, Ku tola bana bakwe.

  **2.**   
Ta tuka pengi Jesu a bola, Ta tukapengi Jesu a bola;   
Ta tu kapengi Jesu a bola, Ku tola bana bakwe.

  **3.**   
Ta tuka lili Jesu a bola, Ta tuka lili Jesu a bola;   
Ta tuka lili Jesu a bola, Ku tola bana bakwe.

  **4.**   
Tuya kwimbila Jesu a bola, Tuya Kwimbila Jesu a bola;   
Tuya kwimbila Jesu a bola, Ku tola bana bakwe.

title: 198: MWEENZUMA MUBOTU NGU JESU
markdown:
CS 50 AH 114 CH 528   
 ### 198 MWEENZUMA MUBOTU NGU JESU   
THE BEST FRIEND IS JESUS

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Mweenzuma mubotu ngu Jesu, Naa nda njila mumapenzi;   
Usilika mu moyo, Ula yumya mu luse,   
O mweenzuma mubotu Jesu.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Mweenzuma mubotu JeÉsu, Mweenzuma mubotu Jesu;   
(Mubotu Jesu)(Mubotu Jesu)   
Na wawa ula gwasya, Na walila ula mvwa,   
Mweenzuma mubotu ngu Jesu.

  **2.**   
Ndaba mweezuma mbuli Jesu, Undiletela kuumuna;   
Kuyama ku maanza tandi kayowi lufu;   
O mweenzuma mubotu Jesu.

  **3.**   
Kuti nda janika mukuusa, A mapenzi andivulila;   
Tandikayoowi cintu, Muvuni ulÕ andime,   
Mwenzuma mubotu Jesu.

  **4.**   
Twaakusika oku ku munzi, A basetekene antomwe;   
Tuya kwimbila nkomwe kukabe kutamani,   
O Mweenzuma mubotu Jesu.

title: 199: A TULUMBE LEZA
markdown:
CS 191 AH 144 CH 647 SDAH 341   
 ### 199 A TULUMBE LEZA   
TO GOD BE THE GLORY

Doh is Ab

  **1.**   
A Tulumbe Mwami Nkwatucitila   
Wa kayanda nyika wa tupa Jesu;   
Waka fwila tonse watu nununa;   
Wajula mulyango Tunjile tonse.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Mu mulumbe Leza nyika imvwe ijwi,   
Mu mulumbe Leza, Inywe bantu bonse,   
Bola kuli Tata mu Mwana wakwe,   
Tumu tembaule nkwa tucitila.

  **2.**   
Kunununwa kwakaulwa bulowa;   
Ncisyomyo ca Mwami kuli ba syoma;   
Mubisyi ubola a kumusyoma,   
Ku fwambana zibi zya lekelelwa.

  **3.**   
Nkunji nkwakacita akutuyisya,   
Nkukomana kunji ku Mwana Leza;   
Kuli sumpukide nkupati pati,   
Cikankamanisya twabona Jesu.

  **4.**   
Nkunji nkwatugwasya, Nkunji nkwatupa;   
Atu komanisye mu Mwana wakwe   
Tuya kukomana wa bola Jesu,   
Mu bulemu bwakwe tuya kubona.

title: 200: OSALALA OSALALA OSALALA
markdown:
CS 327 AH 30 CH 73 SDAH 73   
 ### 200 OSALALA OSALALA OSALALA   
HOLY, HOLY, HOLY

Doh is E

  **1.**   
Osalala Mwami we osi nguzu,   
Naabwaca lyonse tula kuimbila;   
O salala Mwami webo Siluse,   
Leza wa zyonse otakamani.

  **2.**   
Osalala Mwami Bangele bonse;   
Baya kuku paila ku cuno cako,   
Zyulu, zyulu, zyulu, Bakuvuntamina,   
Oka liko Oya kuba lyonse.

  **3.**   
Osalala Mwami Na kusiya mbi;   
Imu bulemu bwako tatu muboni,   
Ndiwe usalala, Taaku mbuli ndiwe;   
Usetekene mukusalala.

title: 201: WAKANDIGUSYA
markdown:
Cs 192   
 ### 201  WAKANDIGUSYA   
HE BROUGHT ME OUT

  **1.**   
Moyo wangu wakabisya ku Mwami;   
Zinyonyono zyangu zya ka ndisowa;   
Ndaka lila ku Mwami, Kundivuna,   
Waka ndifutula kuzwa ku lufu.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
O Waka ndigusya mucibi,   
Walo waka ndiimika a Bbwe,   
Ndiya kumwiimbila lyonse,   
Lwimbo lwa kumu lumbaizya.

  **2.**   
Wakandibika a Bbwe liyumu,   
Ndaka zumina ndiya kuba a nguwe,   
Taaku mapenzi neya kuba a nguwe,   
Mu luse lwakwe andipe musyini.

  **3.**   
Waka ndipa lwiimbo lwa ku mulumba   
Ndiya ku mwiimbila kutamani,   
Moyo wangu ula komana lyonse,   
Ndiya ku mulumba waka ndivuna.

  **4.**   
Ndiya kwiimba luse lwakwe luyumu;   
Ndiya ku kambauka kuli bonse,   
Ndiya kwiimba lufutuko koonse,   
Limwi nyika isyome muli Leza.

title: 202: JESU NDI SOLOLELE
203: MUKOMANISYI WASIKA
204: BOOLA MUSOWEKI
markdown:
Cs 3   
 ### 204 BOOLA MUSOWEKI   
WELCOME WANDERER WELCOME

  **1.**   
Munyika ya beenzu kufumbwa nkooya;   
Umvwa ijwi liti, ÒMwana wangu.Ó

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Boola musoweki boola ku munzi,   
O wakasowekede ko piluka.

  **2.**   
Munyika ya nzala ya kupengesya;   
Boola ukomane mwana wangu.

  **3.**   
Siya kuta mvwana, Sowa mapenzi,   
Moyo ula penga Mwana wangu

  **4.**   
Langa ku mulyango, Nuucijukide;   
Ncilindila ndiwe Mwana wangu.

  **5.**   
Waka ingaila, Tona katala;   
Boola ulelekwa Mwana wangu.

  **5.**   
Kolanga zya kulya, Ndicikuyeya;   
Boola ulyookezye Mwana wangu.

  **5.**   
Langa tokwe munzi, Taaku ncocita;   
Ndicikuyanda Mwana wangu.

title: 205: JESU NACIPETEKEZYA
206: WANDI CITILA NZI?
markdown:
CS 96 AH 178 CH 230   
 ### 206 WANDI CITILA NZI?   
WHAT HAST THOU DONE FOR ME?

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Nda kafwila ndiwe, ndatila bulowa;   
Kuti ufutuke uta fwi alimwi,   
Nda kakupa kufutuka, hena wandi panzi?   
Nda kakupa kufutuka, hena wandi panzi?

  **2.**   
Munzi wa Tata, a bwami bwangu bonse;   
Nda kasiila Ônyika, kwenda muku penga,   
Ndakakusiila konse, wandi siila nzi?   
Nda kakusiila konse, wandi siila nzi?

  **3.**   
Ndaka kupengela, O kuta ambiki;   
kupenga kupati, ku ku angulula,   
Ndaka fwila a Cingano, Wandi citila nzi?   
Ndaka fwila a Cingano, Wandi citila nzi?

title: 207: WANDILEKELELA
markdown:
Cs 158   
 ### 207 WANDILEKELELA   
SEALS MY PARDON

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Ndaka mubona a Cingano, Watila bulowa   
O waka ndi bona ndili afwaafwi, a Cingano;

  **2.**   
Cila ndikankamanisya kubona lufu lwakwe;   
Ndime ndaka cita kuti afwe a Cingano.

  **3.**   
Kulanga kwabili ati, ÒNda kulekelelaÓ   
Bulowa obu ndakupa kuti ufutuke.

  **4.**   
Bubi bwangu bwaka leta lufu kuli ndiwe,   
O lu luse lupati, Lwakundilekelela.

title: 208: ENDA KABOTU
markdown:
CS 204 AH 101 CH 644 SDAH 479   
 ### 208 ENDA KABOTU   
TREAD SOFTLY

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Umuna umuna upetekezye,   
Umuna umuna teleela ijwi,

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Koenda kabotu, Munsi a Mwami,   
Koenda kabotu, Ula kuita.

  **2.**   
Umuna umuna musetekene,   
Cikombelo ca mulumbe wa luse,

  **3.**   
Umuna umuna atu paile,   
Bubotu bwa Edeni atulombe,

  **4.**   
Umuna umuna tambula luse,   
Umuna umuna lindila Mwami.

title: 209: KWEENDA AFWAAFWI
markdown:
CS 160 AH 310 CH 383 SDAH 315   
 ### 209 KWEENDA AFWAAFWI   
O FOR A CLOSER WALK!

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Kuenda munsi a Leza, Mububambe bwa julu;   
Kusalala ku mweke munzila ya Ciingano.

  **2.**   
Kopiluka osalala, Otupa ku lyokezya;   
Nsiyandi zibi zyaka ndipa kusiya ndiwe.

  **3.**   
Ndakali wakukomana Ndici ziyeya zyoonse;   
Zyandi siila kucisa, Nyika tindi ponyi.

  **4.**   
Nenda zyiba cikozyano, Eco ncendiyandisya;   
Ndigwasye cizwe ku cuno cako ndikukombe.

title: 210: MUFUTULI UKANKAMANISYA
markdown:
CS 204 AH 101 CH644 SDAH 335   
 ### 210 MUFUTULI UKANKAMANISYA   
WHAT A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR

Doh is D

  **1.**   
Klistu watu fwida tonse, Mufutuli mupati;   
Waka tunununa tonse, Mufutuli mupati.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Jesu wangu Mufutuli Mwami mubotu,   
Jesu wangu Muvuni Mwami mubotu. 

  **2.**   
Ndamulumba wandisanzya, Mufutuli mupati;   
Ndasalazigwa kwa Leza, Mufutuli mupati

  **3.**   
Wandisalazya mu moyo, Mufutuli mupati;   
Ndamu tambula mu moyo, Mufutuli mupati.

  **4.**   
U enda andime lyonse, Mufutuli mupati;   
Ula ndipa kusyomeka, Mufutuli mupati.

  **5.**   
Munguzu zyakwe ndazunda, Mufutuli mupati;   
Amu masunko ndakoma, Mufutuli mupati.

  **5.**   
E ndamupa moyo wangu, Mufutuli mupati;   
Zya nyika zyonse ndasiya, Mufutuli mupati.

title: 211: ZILELEKO ZINJI
markdown:
CS 207 AH 153 CH 652 SDAH 195   
 ### 211 ZILELEKO ZINJI   
SHOWERS OF BLESSING

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Kula kuba zileleko nci syomyo ca luyando,   
Ziindi Zibotu zi boola kuzwa ku Mufutuli.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Izileleko, Tulomba zileleko;   
Mu luse tukomanisye, Twalomba zileleko.

  **2.**   
Kula kuba zileleko, Zyaku tu bukulusya,   
Muma lundu mumisena, Ulapa zileleko.

  **3.**   
Kula kuba zileleko, Kotu tilila Mwami;   
Kotugwasya kotuyumya; Bola zuzya jwi lyako.

  **4.**   
Kula kuba zileleko, Kufwambana twa pegwa,   
Kuli Leza twalisisya, Kwa Jesu tula ita.

title: 212: LUUMUNO LUBOTU
markdown:
CS 208 AH 253 CH 609   
 ### 212 LUUMUNO LUBOTU   
SWEET PEACE

Doh is A

  **1.**   
Ndakamvwa mu moyo wangu (wangu);   
Kukomana muli ndime (ndime)   
Ndila imba ulumuno, Cipego ca luyando.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ku-u-mu-na cipego ca kujulu,   
Olu nduumuno lwini, Cipego ca luyamdo.

  **2.**   
Muli Klistu wa lumuno (Klistu);   
Mu lufu ndasalazigwa (ime),   
Takuli inzina imbi,   
Acipego ca luyando.

  **3.**   
Nenda kazumina Jesu (Jesu)   
Mu moyo ndakakomana,   
Buvubi ndaka bujana,   
Acipego ca luyando.

  **4.**   
Muli Jesu ndakomana,   
Nendi enda awe lyonse,   
Taku cimbi nduumuno,   
Acipego ca luyando.

title: 213: LWIMBO LWANGU
markdown:
CS 235 AH 257 CH 613   
 ### 213 LWIMBO LWANGU   
MY SONG

Doh  1   
Jesu Muvuni wangu, Ndiwe lwimbo lwangu;   
Ngu Mufutuli wangu, No ndili pengele.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Jesu Muvuni wangu, Ndila ku kwimbila;   
Ndiwe mukwesu wangu, Jesu Nda kuyanda.

  **2.**   
Ndiwe kusyoma kwangu, Myaka yonse yonse?   
Nendi sunkwa kupenga, Nda lila bunene.

  **3.**   
Nda kusyoma Muvuni, Musololi wangu;   
Nda kuyanda bunene, Kwinda nyika yonse.

  **4.**   
Jesu ngu lwimbo lwangu, Nendi li mu nyika;   
Jesu Ula kuba lwimbo, Lwangu a ku julu.

title: 214: HENA JESU ULA GWASYA
markdown:
CS 492 AH 122 SDAH 181   
 ### 214 HENA JESU ULA GWASYA   
DOES JESUS CARE?

Doh is Db

  **1.**   
Hena Jesu wandengelela,   
Nandili mumapenzi   
Mikuli yalema zya munyika,   
Anzila ya ndilampila.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Inzya ula nde ngelela,   
Umvwa ku penga kwangu;   
Buzuba a masiku bwa lampa;   
Mwami ula ndi langa.

  **2.**   
Hena Jesu uli ndi bwene?   
Ku solwa nkwe ndi sunkwa,   
Nda penga masiku nku ndalila;   
Nda bula tulo nda ona.

  **3.**   
Hena Jesu undengelela?   
Kukaka mu masunko.   
Nendi pengesya, Nsikwe lumuno;   
Nda lila limwi bukace.

  **4.**   
Jesu ula ndi engelela,   
Nendi laya mukwesu,   
Moyo wa penga, Moyo wa usa;   
Hena mbwa ndi engelela.

title: 215: LINDA UTA TONGAUKI
markdown:
CS 551 AH 258 CH 616   
 ### 215 LINDA UTA TONGAUKI   
WAIT AND MURMUR NOT

Doh is C

  **1.**   
Imunzi wesu mubotu oko kunyina mapenzi;   
O munzi wakalelekwa tuya ku lyookezya kuya.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Linda É. Linda uta katali, Linda ÉlindaÉ   
Lindila.   
Linda uta katali, linda É. Linda Élinda É   
lindila.   
Linda uta katali (uta katali)

  **2.**   
Na walemenwa mikuli, Nja kakupa Mwami Leza;   
Nko uli munzi mubotu, Linda uta katali.

  **3.**   
Inzila noiba amamvwa, Uta utuli mukuli;   
Moyo wako noupenga, Kolanga ku Mufutuli.

  **4.**   
Koya musa uta cebi, Uta lubi kupaila;   
Buzuba bwa ku lyookezya bula fwambana kusika.

title: 216: NSELI NDELIKE
markdown:
CS 557   
 ### 216 NSELI NDELIKE   
NEVER ALONE

Doh is C

  **1.**   
Kuyowa takuko Jesu ula Ôfwafwi;   
Ula ndiembela lyoonse ndizi ulÕafwafwi;   
Nendi bula beenzuma ndiya kwendaÕJesu   
Uta kamani uya kuba lyoonse.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Pe takandisiyi É.Pe tandisiyi,   
(Pe pe takandisiyi, pepe takandisiyi)   
Ula ndi Ésololela koonse, Pe takandisiyi,   
Pe takandisiyi É.Pe tandisiyi,   
(Pe pe takandisiyi, pepe takandisiyi)   
Ula ndi sololela koonse, Pe taka ndi siyi.

  **2.**   
Kupenga takuko nendili anguwe,   
Ndila komana nendili a Mufutuli;   
Ndi pengede mebo nce ndi jatisisya;   
A janza lya Mwami Jesu ndiya ku futuka.

  **3.**   
Ndila mulindila waka ndi syomenzya;   
Mwami wangu na muka ndiya kusyomeka,   
Ndakomana bunji kuba mwana wakwe,   
Ula ndipa kuyuma limwi ndika futuke.

title: 217: CIMWI CA JESU
markdown:
CS 614 AH 242 CH 283   
 ### 217 CIMWI CA JESU   
SOMETHING FOR JESUS

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Luyando lwa Mwami, Ndowaka ndipa;   
Nda musungulila nkwe ndi jisi;   
Nja kulumbaizya Mufutuli wangu,   
Mulumbo ndaleta onse wako.

  **2.**   
A cuuno ca luse uci kombelela,   
Nda langa kuli Ôwe Mwami Jesu,   
Ndi gwasye O Mwami njumune Ciingano;   
Ndiya ku mwiimbila a luyando.

  **3.**   
Ndipa moyo wini usyomeka,   
Kuti ndipe wako ciindi coonse;   
Ndi nyone anguzu, Ndigwasye batete,   
A kuyandaula ba soweki.

  **4.**   
Koonse nkwe ndi jisi, nja kumupa,   
Mucindi ceelede, Mwami wangu;   
Kuti nda mubona Mufutuli wangu;   
Ndiya kukomana kutamani.

title: 218: MATALISYO OMWE
markdown:
CS 619 AH 334 CH 433   
 ### 218 MATALISYO OMWE   
ONE FOUNDATION

Doh is Eb

  **1.**   
Matalikilo a cikombelo ngu Jesu;   
Cilengwa cakwe cipya a menda Ôjwi lyakwe;   
Wakazwa ku julu ku londa nkamu yakwe   
Nja kaula bulowa eyo nja kafwida.

  **2.**   
Basale ku Mikowa, boonse balaÕntomwe,   
Bali mu Mwami omwe lusyomo kuzyalwa   
Eli zina libotu ilya Mwami wesu,   
Lijisi kulangila a luse lupati.

  **3.**   
Inkamu na ya swana, Mapenzi mapati;   
Bantu ba Satani nakuba bailwana   
Bakondwa bala imba Òkobola O MwamiÓ   
Kulila kula mana nyimbo tukaimbe.

  **4.**   
Akati ka mapenzi akati ka nkondo;   
Inkamu ila lindila kusyoma lyonse,   
Kusikila bantu babone Mufutuli;   
Inkamu izunde ijane lufutuko.

title: 219: NDISOLOLELE JEHOVA
markdown:
CS 706 CH 409 AH 303 SDAH 538   
 ### 219 NDISOLOLELE JEHOVA   
GUIDE ME O THOU GREAT JEHOVA

Doh is A

  **1.**   
Ndisololele Jehova, ndili mwenzu munyika;   
UlaÕnguzu me nsi jisi, Ndalomba kuli ndiwe,   
Mufutuli, Mufutuli, Ndiwe conde ciyumu (ciyumu);   
Ndiwe conde ciyumu.

  **2.**   
Kojula Ôtinti libotu, Ndinywe menda abumi;   
Ndisololele Jehova, Mukwenda kwangu konse,   
Munununi, Munununi, Ndiwe inguzu zya ngu;   
Ndiwe inguzu zya ngu.

  **3.**   
Kuti ndasika Jordani, gusya kuyowa kwangu:   
Undisi ndikile Mwami, Ndisike ku Kenani   
Nyimbo zya kulumbaizya, Nyimbo zya Mwami wesu;   
Ndila kulumbaizya.

title: 220: KU MUNZI
markdown:
CS 855 AH 428 CH 639 SDAH 436   
 ### 220 KU MUNZI   
THE HOME LAND

Doh if F

  **1.**   
Ku munzi ÔO kumunzi, nyika ya kuumuna;   
Kunyina a masiku kusalala lyoonse,   
Nyanda munzi uyo a moyo wangu onse,   
Munzi unyina mapenzi, Ndayanda nkasike   
Munzi unyina malwazi, Munzi waba Leza.

  **2.**   
Mwami uli ku munzi a bangele bakwe;   
Taaku cibi mu munzi, Kunyina masunko;   
Inyimbo zya mumo zilumbaizya Mwami;   
Kuti nda uyeya munzi ilazwa misozi,   
Kuti nda uyeya munzi ilazwa misozi.

  **3.**   
Bantu bakala mumo bala ndiita kuya,   
Uko  kunyina lufu, Kunyina mapenzi,   
Munzi uyandika iwa ku lyookezya,   
Klistu tutole ku munzi iwa lufutuko,   
Klistu tutole ku munzi iwa lufutuko.

title: 221: GALILE
markdown:
CS 247   
 ### 221 GALILE   
GALILEE

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Ilalila (ilalila) nziba yakwe (nziba yakwe)   
Mangolezya (manglezya) a kwe Mwami (akwe Mwami)   
Citondezya (citondezya) kusanzigwa (kusanzigwa)   
Cindiyezya (cindiyezya) ku Galile (kugalile)

  **CIINDULULO:**   
O Galile, ku Galile Jesu OÕnkwakatufwida   
O Galile, ku Galile bola kocindiimbila.

  **2.**   
Mucibanda (mucibanda) camaluba (camaluba)   
I bayuni (ibayuni) balaimba (balaimba)   
Mucifumo (mucifumo) balaimba (balaimba)   
Kuimbisya (kuimbisya) mugalile.

  **3.**   
Ndilaiya (ndilaiya) mumangwalo (mumangwalo)   
Mbwalanduka (mbwalanduka) imulwizi (imulwizi)   
Ndayandisya (ndayandisya) ikuziba (ikuziba)   
Kucilila (akucilila) kugalile (kugalile)

title: 222: MU MABOKO A JESU
markdown:
CS 222 CH 615   
 ### 222 MU MABOKO A JESU   
SAFE THE ARMS OF JESUS

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Ndikale muli Jesu, Mu maboko akwe;   
A mu luyando lwakwe, Nda jana kuumuna,   
Komvwa mbangele abo, Baimba kuli Ôme;   
A mu bulemu bwakwe, Kwitala a lwizi.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ndikale muli Jesu, Mu maboko akwe;   
Amu luyando lwakwe, Ndajana kumuna.

  **2.**   
Ndi kale muli Jesu, Andi sololele,   
Ndi siye masukusyo, Ndibe usalala,   
Nketa jisi kuusa, Nketa jisi ku yowa;   
A masunko masyoonto, A kulila konse.

  **3.**   
Jesu nce ciyubilo, Wakafwida ime;   
Ibbwe liyumu lyesu, Ndiya kumu syoma,   
Ndila kumu lindila, Ndila ku syomeka,   
Limwi ndika mu bone, Ku nkomwe ya Golide.

title: 223: CILILA KOONSE
224: MIMUNI A IYAKE
markdown:
CS 480 AH 356 CH 628   
 ### 224 MIMUNI A IYAKE   
LET THE LOWER LIGHT BE BURNING

Doh isBb

  **1.**   
Luse lwa Mwami ndupati kukabe kutamani,   
Ulatutondezya nzila yakuya ku Kenani.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Mimuni yesu iyake Tutole ijwi lyakwe,   
Kuli abafwa muzibi Kuti bakafutuke.

  **2.**   
Zibi zyanyika zyavula zila tu tantamuna,   
Pesi tula yandisisya Kusika ku Kenani.

  **3.**   
Atumunike bakwesu Tufutule babisyi,   
Kutola mulumbe wakwe Kuli bafwa mucibi.

title: 225: YIMA MBULI SICAMBA
markdown:
CS 508 AH 367 CH 576 SDAH 610   
 ### 225 YIMA MBULI SICAMBA   
STAND LIKE THE BRAVE

Doh is Ab

  **1.**   
Buka mu Klistu Mwami Ula kwita,   
Ubweze zilwanyo mu manza ako;   
Kulwana musunki ca kuta yowa,   
Ube sicamba umutande mubi.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Uta yoowi, Uta yoowi, Uta yoowi,   
Umu tande mubi.

  **2.**   
Cenjela, yuma lwana, Uta yoowi;   
Uta cebi yuma, koya Sinkondo,   
Babi ba musinze naa waba koma;   
Ube Sicamba umu tande mubi.

  **3.**   
Mulumbe wa Mwami uunke koonse;   
Koyuma kolwana limwi ukone,   
Aku sololele koonse nkwayanda;   
Ube Sicamba umu tandemubi.

  **4.**   
Musololi uli afwafwi tonka;   
Siluse ula tupa kukomana,   
A luyando lwini wa ka tuyanda;   
Ube Sicamba umu tande mubi.

title: 226: AFWAAFWI KU ZUMINA
markdown:
CS 89 AH 183 CH 228   
 ### 226 AFWAAFWI KU ZUMINA   
ALMOST PERSUADED

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Ndati zumine, Mufutuli;   
Ndati zumine Klistu Mwami   
Koya muya unka, Ndalimvwa ndakaka,   
Bumwi ibuzuba, Nja ku kwita.

  **2.**   
Ndati zumine kucilila,   
Ndati zumine, kuya kwakwe,   
Jesu ula ita, Bangele nkobali;   
Mipailo yabo, Ila kwita.

  **3.**   
Ndati zumine, Mamanino;   
Ndati zumine, Ndafwa lino,   
ÔMbali taigwasyi, Ômbali ilaÕlufu,   
Nkuusa akulila, Nda soweka.

title: 227: ACIINGANO
markdown:
CS 212 SDAH 163   
 ### 227 ACIINGANO   
AT THE CROSS

Doh is E

  **1.**   
Mufutuli wandifwida watila bulowa;   
Kuti ime ndifutuke nditafwi alimwi.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Aciingano cakwe wakandisalazya,   
Akundiangulula mumoyo (mu moyo)   
Wakandiyumya mulusyomo lwangu,   
Ncekomana mazuba onse.

  **2.**   
Luyando lupati buti kufwa aciingano   
Kundigusya zibi zyangu akundisalazya.

  **3.**   
Kuusa takundigwasyi pele nguzu zyakwe   
O Mwami ndaboola kwako ndimuntu mubisyi.

title: 228: AMUMULUMBAIZYE
markdown:
CS 226 AH 140 CH 645 SDAH 249   
 ### 228 AMUMULUMBAIZYE   
PRAISE HIM PRAISE HIM

Doh is Ab

  **1.**   
Lumbaizya Jesu Mufutuli wesu;   
Imba nyoonse luse lwakwe lwini,   
Mulemeke mungele mupati wesu;   
Ali lumbwe Zina lyakwe Mwami,   
Jesu Mwembezi ulinda bana bakwe,   
MumanzaÕkwe uba bweza lyonse.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Lumbaizya Zina lyakwe litamani   
Lumbaizya kube kutamani.

  **2.**   
Lumbaizya Jesu Mufutuli wesu;   
Zibi zyesu waka zipengela,   
Ndibbwe lyesu ciyubilo citamani;   
Mulemeke Jesu wa Kalivali   
Tumukombe Jesu waka tufwida,   
LuyandoÕlu lwakwe lutamani.

  **3.**   
Lumbaizya Jesu Mufutuli wesu   
Muimbile nyimbo zya kujulu,   
Mufutuli Jesu kube kutamani,   
Mupe bwami Muleli mupati,   
KlistuÕla boola kuza kujaya nyika;   
Nguzu bwami nzizyakwe Muvuni.

title: 229: NGUNI ULI AMBALI LYA MWAMI?
markdown:
CS 59   
 ### 229 NGUNI ULI AMBALI LYA MWAMI?   
WHO IS ON THE LORDÕS SIDE?

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Nguni ula mbali lya Mwami,   
Kubi a kubotu ku imvwi?

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Sala, sala, kubi na ku ba kululama.

  **2.**   
Zyulu zi la cilila kubi,   
Ta lu li lubazu luyumu.

  **3.**   
Swana a lubazu lwa Mwami,   
Lolu lu ka kuba a colwe.

title: 230: NDIME NZILA
markdown:
CS 10   
 ### 230 NDIME NZILA   
I AM THE WAY

Doh is Eb

  **1.**   
Tulimbuli imbelele mbotwaingaila;   
Lufutuko mu luba lwa Leza, Ndiye buti.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ndime nzila abumi akasimpe,   
Ubola kwa Tata abole andime,   
Ndime nzila abumi akasimpe,   
Taku  Ôboola kuli ba Taata cita Õme.

  **2.**   
Ndilipengede kuyeya zintu zya munyika;   
Banji bala lila konse o ndazyiba buti.

  **3.**   
Kuli Jesu ndapiluka ndaleka kwingaila;   
Ulakundenzya kumunzi, Kumunzi wa Mwami.

title: 231: JESU ANJILE MUMOYO WAKO
markdown:
CS 25   
 ### 231 JESU ANJILE MUMOYO WAKO   
LET JESUS COME INTO YOUR HEART

Doh

  **1.**   
Kuti walemenwa zinyonyono, Jesu anjile mumoyo;   
Na wabula kufutuka kupya, Jesu anjile mumoyo.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Leka kulengaula, Uta musowi Jesu,   
Lino komujulila, Jesu anjile mumoyo.

  **2.**   
Kuti walilila kusanzigwa, Jesu anjile mumoyo;   
Matinti alÕafwafwi kosamba, Jesu anjile Mumoyo.

  **3.**   
Kuti beenzinyoko bakusiya, Jesu anjile mumoyo;   
Jesu uya kuba mwenzinyoko, Jesu anjile mumoyo.

  **4.**   
Nyimbo zya cipego nociimba, Jesu anjile mumoyo;   
Kunjila mu maanda abwami, Jesu anjile mumoyo.

  **5.**   
Na wayanda kwiimba aba Jesu, Leka anjile mumoyo;   
Na wayanda maanda a bwami, Jesu anjile mumoyo.

title: 232: NSIKAKUSIYI
markdown:
CS 697 AH 301 CH 397   
 ### 232 NSIKAKUSIYI   
I WILL NEVER LEAVE THEE

Doh is Eb

  **1.**   
Taku nentikakusiye, Njakuba andiwe, lyonse;   
Ndiya kukwenzya kabotu Nkambo ka luse lwangu,   
Utayowi utayowi, Pesi konditelela.

  **2.**   
Luwo no lukuzunganya, Kondiita mukulomba,   
Ndiya kuku jatilila, Nkujate a luyando,   
Mukusunkwa mukusunkwa, Ndiya kwitubya nzila.

  **3.**   
Kujulu kwasalala ngwa, Nkobede kwasalala,   
Kukomana kulazula, Konse kuya kubotu,   
Ndilaandiwe ndilaandiwe, Njaku ku sololela.

  **4.**   
Buumi bwako bula tyompwa, No pengesya mumoyo,   
Masunko naavulisya, Nja kuku sololela,   
Indembela yalu yando, Muli ndime wazunda.

title: 233: NDAAMBILE KAAMBO KAKAINDI
markdown:
CS 311 AH 80 CH 524 SDAH 196   
 ### 233 NDAAMBILE KAAMBO KAKAINDI   
TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY

Doh is C

  **1.**   
Ndambile kambo kakwe, Kuzintu zya kujulu;   
Zya Jesu bulemu bwakwe aluyando lwakwe,   
Ndambile kambo kabotu, Nka kabotu ku Mwana,   
Nsijisi nguzu ndapenga, Undi gusye cibi.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ndambile kambo kakwe, Kambo ka Mwami Jesu,   
Kambo Ka Mufutuli, aluyando lwakwe.

  **2.**   
Ndambile kambo kakwe, Kuti ndizyibisye;   
Ka Lufutuko lupati, Aluyando lwakwe,   
Ndambile kambo lyonse, Nditaka lubi limbi,   
Mume wacifumofumo wayuma sikati.

  **3.**   
Ndambile kambo kakwe waba muku yowa;   
Bubotu bwa nyika eyi, Butola ku lufu,   
E abulemu bwanyika, Bwaca ku bumi bwangu,   
Ndambile kambo ka Mwami, Jesu ula ponya.

title: 234: JESU MUMUNI WA NYIKA
markdown:
CS 313   
 ### 234 JESU MUMUNI WA NYIKA   
JESUS THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD

Doh is F

  **1.**   
Bala imba bangele, Jesu mumuni wesu;   
Mwami wa zyalwa sunu mu muni wa nyika.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Tula enda mu kusalala,   
Bola tu njile mu luse lwakwe,   
Tupe kusalala kwako lyonse,   
Mu muni wa nyika.

  **2.**   
Atu komane tonse, Jesu mu muni wesu;   
Waka tufwida tonse, Mu muni wa nyika.

  **3.**   
Klistu tu mu lemeke, Jesu mu muni wesu;   
Mwami uta kanani, Mumuni wa nyika.

  **4.**   
Wazyalwa Mufutuli, Jesu mu muni wesu;   
Zuba lya bululami, Mu muni wa nyika.

title: 235: ALIMWI BUZUBA BWA SIKA
markdown:
CS 380 AH 391 CH 466   
 ### 235 ALIMWI BUZUBA BWA SIKA   
AGAIN THE DAY RETURNS

Doh is Eb

  **1.**   
Buzuba busalala bwa sika,   
Mwami wa lenga nyika wa bu leleka;   
Swe to bakwe milimo tu taciti,   
Mu buzuba bubotu bwa Mwami.

  **2.**   
Tu setekanye Nsabata ya Mwami,   
Twiye luyando lwakwe a ku mucilila;   
Uya kumvwa mipailo njo tu pa,   
Notu imba mu kulumbaizya.

  **3.**   
Mwami wesu ko tumvwa no tuita,   
Tu tumine luse lwako twa kulombesya;   
Kotu yumya mu myoyo twa paila,   
Janza lyako litu sololele.

  **4.**   
Taata wesu muli ndiwe twaita,   
Ndiwe ciyubilo twalombesya tu vune;   
Ndiwe nzila tu tondezye kasimpe,   
Mwami wesu kube kutamani.

title: 236: LUYANDO LUTAULWI
markdown:
CS 367   
 ###   
 ### 236 LUYANDO LUTAULWI   
HIS LOVING KINDNESS

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Buuka moyo wangu imba Uyimbile Munununi,   
Ndielede Ku Mwimbila Luyando O lutaulwi.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Luyando lubotu lwini, Luyando O lutaulwi.

  **2.**   
Wandibona nda bisyigwa Wandi yanda nendiboobo,   
Wandi futusya mukubi Luyando o lutaulwi.

  **3.**   
Niba vula aba penzyi Nzila ne isunkwa kubi,   
Ula kwenzya moyo wangu Luyando O lutaulwi.

  **4.**   
Ninda bomba mu kupenga Kupenga kupati pati   
Lyoonse ula kala ame Luyando O lutaulwi.

title: 237: IMINA JESU
markdown:
CS 628 AH 368 CH 354 SDAH 618   
 ### 237 IMINA JESU   
STAND UP FOR JESUS

Doh is Bb

  **1.**   
Ima imina Jesu basimamba bakwe,   
Munyamune ndembela nomuzunda mubi,   
Nomukoma kunkondo musololi ngu Jesu,   
Limwi mubi amane Jesu Mwami wini.

  **2.**   
Ima imina Jesu mpeta ilaita,   
Kamuya mukalwane mubulemu bwakwe,   
Nobantu mumukombe muzwe kubabyabi   
Muyume mumasunko canguzu mukome. 

  **3.**   
Ima imina Jesu inguzu nzizyakwe,   
Masunko mulakoma mutabi nolike,   
Amusame kasimpe akupailisya,   
Mumulimo masunko mukabe bayumu.

  **4.**   
Ima imina Jesu nkondo ilamana,   
Nokuba nkondo sunu junza tuyakwiimba   
Kuli oyo ukoma musyini wabuumi,   
Uyakukala Mwami akulela lyoonse.

title: 238: MBA BANI A BA?
markdown:
CS 890   
 ### 238 MBA BANI A BA?   
WHO WHO ARE THESE?

Doh is E

  **1.**   
Mbabani aba iba landuka, Bafutulwa a kuzwa ku lufu?   
Jesu ula futusya, Basamba mu bulowa.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Baka njila milyango ya Jelusalema,   
Basamba mu bulowa bakwe,   
Baka njila milyango ya Jerusalema,   
Basamba mu bulowa.

  **2.**   
Aba mba baabo mu bukubusyi, Bajana Jesu mu nzila zyakwe,   
Luse lwakwe ba jana, Basamba mu bulowa.

  **3.**   
Aba mba bakali mu mapenzi, Lyonse a Jesu bala komana,   
Balaseka mu myoyo, Basamba mu bulowa.

  **4.**   
Aba mba bakali mu masunko, Baka zunda mulilo u yaka,   
Jesu ula baita, Basamba mu bulowa.

  **5.**   
Nku botu ku nkomwe isalala, Kutakwe cibi kuusa Ôlufu,   
Bala komana lyoonse, Basamba mu bulowa.

title: 239: WAKATAZIGWA
markdown:
CS 104 AH 326 CH 341   
 ### 239 WAKATAZIGWA   
ART THOU WEARY?

Doh is G

  **1.**   
Wapengesya wakatala, Hena watyompwa?   
Bola kwangu Mwami uita lyookezye.

  **2.**   
Undi sololela buti, Nanditondezya,   
Bona matende a mu manzaÕkwe wayaswa.

  **3.**   
Hena musyini wa bwami, bamu samika?   
Oyu musyini wakasimpe, wa mamvwa.

  **4.**   
Mufutuli na ndajana, Ula ndipa nzi?   
Kuusa kwamana buumi butafwi nda jana

  **5.**   
Kuti ndajatisya kwakwe, Ula ndipa nzi?   
Kuusa kwamana buumi butafwi nda jana

  **5.**   
Na ndalomba kuba wakwe ula ndikaka?   
Takwe kukala limwi cisyomyo cimane.

  **5.**   
Ndamu jana nda cilila, Ula ndipa nzi?   
Baluleme bonse mbabakwe, Fwambaana.

title: 240: LANGA MUFUTULI A MULYANGO
markdown:
CS 112 CH 227   
 ### 240 LANGA MUFUTULI A MULYANGO   
BEHOLD THE SAVIOUR AT THE DOOR

Doh is E

  **1.**   
Langa Muvuni ulimvwi a mulyango, ulaita,   
Wakaliko uciimvwi uta kaki mweenzinyoko.

  **2.**   
Ula kupa zikobelo zita kapyi, zisalala,   
Jula meso umu bone ugusye tombe mu moyo.

  **3.**   
Teelela ijwi lilamba, Òkopiluka o mubisyi   
Ciindi citana kumana, Kosala ku mucilila. 

  **4.**   
Ciindi cilÕafwi ku mana, Tana leka kuita,   
Bubi bukale ku bubi, A kubotu kuku botu.

  **5.**   
Mulyango ula kujalwa, Uta muki, mujulile,   
Ula ita moyo wako, Uta yumyi moyo wako.

  **5.**   
Tambula mweenzu mubotu, Ula kupa ku lyookezya,   
Uya kuenda a nguwe, a kulya anguwe lyonse

title: 241: NYIKA YA BEULA
markdown:
CS 691 AH 433 CH 554   
 ### 241 NYIKA YA BEULA   
BEULAH LAND

Doh  is G

  **1.**   
Ndasika mu nyika impya, Lubono lonse ndu lwangu,   
Oku ku nyika imbotu, A masiku aka mane.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ku nyika ya ku Kenani, Ndikaime a cilundu,   
Ndi langisyisye kutala nkokuli nganda ku julu   
Ndi kabone ijulu munzi uta kamani.

  **2.**   
Mufutuli ulÕambebo, Tukakanane anguwe,   
Ula ndi kwela a janza, Ku munyinza wa kujulu.

  **3.**   
Ku nunkilila nkubotu, kuzwa mu ma lubaluba,   
Kunyina oko ziyuma, Oko kuli meenda Ôbumi.

  **4.**   
Zila sika ziimbo ano, inyimbo zizwa ku julu,   
A ba ngele balaimba, Inyimbo zya ku futuka.

title: 242: LWA LELEKWA LUSWAANGANYO
markdown:
CS 416 AH481 CH 432 SDAH 380   
 ### 242 LWA LELEKWA LUSWAANGANYO   
BLEST BE THE TIE

Doh is F

  **1.**   
Yalelekwa Ôntambo, Iswanganya myoyo,   
Luyando lwakwe ndwa tupa Nduyanda lwa Julu.

  **2.**   
Ku cuno ca Tata, Twapaila tonse,   
Ku yowa Ôlusyomo lwesu, Aku komanisya

  **3.**   
Tugwasye mikuli, Twalomba Siluse,   
Notu enda mu musinzo tujate luboko.

  **4.**   
Notwaandana a bamwi, Mu myoyo twapenga,

title: 301: MUNYINA SUMINA

title: 302: NDITAMBULE MWEBEDE

### 302 NDITAMBULE MWEBEDE

  **3.**

title: 312: NDILA MUCITILA NZI JESU?
markdown:
### 312 NDILA MUCITILA NZI JESU?   
 WHAT SHALL I DO?

  **1.**   
Ndila Mucitila Nzi Jesu, Ndila Kumuyanda Buti,

  **CIINDULULO:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 313: INGUZU ZYA KUTELELA
markdown:
### 313 INGUZU ZYA KUTELELA

  **2.**

title: 314: IBBWE LILAMFU LINDINDA
markdown:
### 314 IBBWE LILAMFU LINDINDA

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 315: HENA MULATUCINGA?
markdown:
### 315 HENA MULATUCINGA?   
 WILL YOU MEET US?

  **1.**   
Mukwesu ulatucinga, Mukwesu ulatu cinga,

  **2.**

Mucizyi ula tucinga, Mu Kenani lini.

  **3.**   
Inzya tula kucingana, Inzya tula kucingana,   
Inzya tula kucingana, Mu kenani Lini.

title: 316: LITYANI IBBAIBBELE?
markdown:
### 316 LITYANI IBBAIBBELE?   
 WHAT SAYS THE BIBLE?

  **1.**   
Lityani Bbaibbela libotu, Mbwendiya kubuzya ime,   
Kwisya kwabantu kula tusowa, Ibbuku lyakwe lityani.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Banji ta baliteeleli, Lityani hena libalisye,   
Lomya milawo ili kkumi, Langa kuboola kwa Jesu,

  **2.**

  **3.**   
Mula kutyani Jesu abola, Inywe no mu isandula,   
Mula kuingula twailomya, Jesu wati tamwizyi.

title: 317: JERUSALEMA NGOTULINDILA
markdown:
### 317 JERUSALEMA NGOTULINDILA

title: 319: MUNZI WA GOLINDE

### 319 MUNZI WA GOLINDE   
 THE GOLDEN HOME

### 320 HENA NDILEMBEDWE?

### 322 NYIKA YOONSE YAKAZIMINA    
 THE WHOLE WORLD WENT ASTRAY

title: 323: CIINDI CA KU PAILA
markdown:
### 323 CIINDI CA KU PAILA   
 THE HOUR OF PRAYER

  **1.**

  **2.**

markdown:

 JESUS IS CALLING US

  **4.**

title: 325: BALI IFUKA TEEBAKA LUMBA
markdown:
### 325 BALI IFUKA TEEBAKA LUMBA   
 NINE DID NOT THANK THE LORD

  **1.**   
Basicinsenda bali kumi, Bakasanzigwa bonse,

  **CIINDULULO:**

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**

title: 326: JELUSALEMA
markdown:
### 326 JELUSALEMA   
 JERUSALEM

  **1.**   
Munzi mubotu wa Mwami Jesu   
Munzi mubotu waku julu;   
Ngotwabambilwa ku Mufutuli;   
Jelusalema Munzi mubotu.

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Jelusalema,Jelusalema munzi wa Jesu; mubotu;   
Tulaitwa, tulaitwa tonse webo andime,   
Jesu ula twiita.

  **2.**   
Ecino ciindi Jesu ula twiita,   
Tuswiililisye majwi akwe,   
Amuboole noonse momukatede,   
Mujane noonse kulyookezya.

  **3.**   
Ncinzi ncoyeeya mumoyo wako?   
Ncinzi ncoyanda ano ansi?   
Kolisalila buumi na lufu,   
Kosala Jesu aku ponye.

  **4.**   
Kolanga me sunu ndasanduka,   
Ayebo mukwesu sanduka,   
Ayebo mucizyi usanduke;   
Tuka njile mu Jelusalema.

title: 327: NDAYANDA KUZWA KASYOONTO
markdown:
### 327 NDAYANDA KUZWA KASYOONTO   
 I WANT TO COME OUT A LITTLE

  **1.**

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**

title: 328: NDILA KUKOMBELA
markdown:
### 328 NDILA KUKOMBELA   
 I PRAY FOR THEE

  **1.**   
Muvuni wangu ula ndikombelezya;

  **CIINDULULO:**

  **2.**

Cilawo cibotu citamani,   
Uya kundiita kumu cinga kujulu,

  **3.**   
Cikobelo cisalala cituba;   
Ndaciyobolelwa Mwami kujulu,   
Nondacitambula cisalala ngwa,

  **4.**   
Jesu wakujana ambila bamwi;   
Mufutuli wakwe nguwangu lino,   
Kolomba Jesu kuti aba futusye,

title: 329: AFWAAFWI KULI IWE
markdown:
### 329 AFWAAFWI KULI IWE   
 NEAR TO THEE

  **1.**

  **CIINDULULO:**

  **2.**

  **3.**   
Twayanda kuvuna kwako, Tube mbuli ndiwe;   
Tuvune mukusunkwa, Tukwele munsi lyako.

title: 330: KONDIYEEYA
markdown:
### 330 KONDIYEEYA

  **1.**

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ndigwasye kuzumina, Akukumvwa lyonse,

  **2.**

  **3.**   
Izuba lyakalivumba, Lyaleka kubala;   
Naakagagailwa Mwami, Kaambo kakubisya.

title: 331: MUNZI OKUYA
markdown:
### 331 MUNZI OKUYA

  **2.**

  **3.**

Okuya, Okuya, Okuya, Ndiyakusika okuya.

title: 332: BWEZA MUSA
markdown:
### 332 BWEZA MUSA

  **2.**

  **3.**

title: 333: KULAYA KWA MUBELESYI
markdown:
### 333 KULAYA KWA MUBELESYI

  **3.**

  **4.**

title: 336: KALIVALI
markdown:
### 336 KALIVALI CALVARY

  **1.**

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Hena ndiya kukuluba buti Mwami wangu?

  **2.**

  **3.**

  **4.**

  **5.**

title: 337: KUNSI KWA MABABA AKWE
markdown:
### 337 KUNSI KWA MABABA AKWE

  **1.**   
Mubaba lya Leza ndilakala, Antela kuli luwo lukali;

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Ndili kunsi kwa mababa, Nguni uya kundi gusya?

  **2.**

  **3.**   
Mumababa ndila komana, Nkondiya kuyubila kupenga;   
Oko kunyika taijisi cakundifutusya, Oko nkundajana kuumuna.

title: 338: TAAKWE KUFWA MAJWI MABOTU
markdown:
### 338 TAAKWE KUFWA MAJWI MABOTU   
 KINDS WORDS NEVER DIE

  **1.**   
Taakwe kufwa majwi mabotu, Alazwa mumoyo ulomenye,   
Oyeya luyando lwakwe Leza, Inzya mu masi onse nkwabele;   
Majwi aluyando tafwi pe, tafwi pe, Majwi aluyando tafwi pe.

  **2.**   
Kuyeya kubotu takufwi pe, Mbubona maluba mabotu;   
Kula komanisya bantu bonse nene, Obali pengede konse konse,   
Kuyeya kubotu takufwi, takufwi, kuyeya kubotu takufwi pe.

  **3.**   
Luyando talufwi na tafwile, Na tuli mucuumbwe cisiya mbi;   
Twa bola iswe bula boola buzuba, No tuya kuunka kuli Jesu;   
Luyando lubotu talufwi, talufwi, Luyando lubotu talufwi pe.

title: 339: TULA CITA BUTI?
markdown:
### 339 TULA CITA BUTI?   
 WHAT SHALL WE DO?

  **1.**   
Ngaaya makani aku sininzya, Na ila mana insi eyi;   
Makani ala tuyoosya toonse, Tula cita buti?

  **CIINDULULO:**   
Tula cita buti? Tula cita buti?   
Na ila mana insi eyi, Tula cita buti?

  **2.**   
Amu teelele nobasizibi, Mulilo ubambidwe babi;   
Ku julu nkwa baluleme, Tula cita buti?

  **3.**   
Na ilamana insi eyi, Na kuti sunu   
Jesu aboole, Nakuti waita bakwe Tulacita buti?

title: 340: IMBISYA LWIIMBO LWA LUMAMBA
markdown:
### 340 IMBISYA LWIIMBO LWA LUMAMBA SOUND THE BATTLE CRY

  **1.**   
Ko imbisya lwiimbo lwa lumamba,   
Bweza mulawo wa Mwami,   
Mubweze makano Mutayoowi,   
A mu syome ijwi lya Mwami.

CIINDULILO:   
Amu yumuke basilumamba   
Muli bambe ka mwambilana,   
Muye kumbele muye buimba,   
Jesu ula mosololela. 

  **2.**   
Tulaya kulwana sinkondoma,   
Tulielede kukoma,   
Intobo zyesu zila salala,   
Iswe twa lwanina kasimpe.

  **3.**   
Mwami wa boonse kotuleleka,   
Tugwasye aluse lwako,   
Lwamana lumamba notwakoma,   
Tuka same musyini kwako.

title: 341: NDALI SALILA
markdown:

 I HAVE DECIDED
